description:
Badminton - An Introduction to turn beginners into masters

This course will take you from zero badminton knowledge, to understanding advanced techniques and strategies. Whether you want to play doubles or singles, and part of a club tournament or recreationally, this course covers everything you need to know.

After taking this course you will:

  • Understand the different types of equipment needed, and which will suit your ability
  • Learn the different types of shot and when you should use them
  • Get my Top 10 Tips for looking like a pro on your first game
  • Be trained in footwork and how to maximise your responsiveness
  • Balance accuracy and force to get the winning shot every time
  • Understand the rules of the game to ensure you can get straight on with playing
  • Become an able player straight away and be able to play in doubles and club teams!

Take this course today, and unlock a whole new sport!
title: Badminton
